main event: Two airmen at Truax Field observed an egg-shaped silvery blue object that pursued its normal course and disappeared in a rapid climb.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 39 seconds,The object was tracked on radar,Two officers confirmed similar sightings on consecutive days,The object changed direction several times during the observations,The estimated speed of the object was over 600 mph.
witness description: Two airmen on duty at Truax Field
